item.title: Tips to ace in CKA and CKAD exam
item.description: This blog was originally featured as a guide in civo cloud community. CKAD and CKA Certificate I recently passed both CKA and CKAD exams, scoring 98% and 96% respectively. In this blog, I want to share my overall experience and tips to crack these exams. What is CKA? CKA is the Certified Kubernetes Administrator certification, which focuses on administrative skills of managing, troubleshooting and operating a kubernetes cluster.
